title: After pausing background audio, do not restart the audio after a Bluetooth audio device is disconnected.
body: I have developed an app which plays audio using the BackgroundAudioPlayer. If I am listening to audio over Bluetooth and I pause the audio, if the Bluetooth device disconnects, the audio resumes playing.

comments.body: ...one more thing that happens to me every now and then. I start streaming music, listen for a bit then pause/stop the music. I get in my car, bluetooth connect but I don't start playing any music. When my car disconnects from bluetooth, my music starts playing from my phone. At this point the music has been stopped and shouldn't be playing.
This problem is also seen in the Slacker App, the MetroRadio app and XBox Music...
